item.title: SEDG
item.description: score:-78 Chances: The Fed meeting spurred confidence in lower inflation and lower interest rates in 2024. Solar energy forecasts from Citi and Morgan Stanley point to increased solar panel installations in 2024. Enphase Energy strengthening its footprint in the European solar market with the introduction of home energy systems in Italy.
